title: Pixel 2 xl after last update has 8 seconds of silence when picking up calls.
content:
After last update my Pixel 2 XL has call issue. When I hav a call and push green button to answer i have  8 seconds of silence in speaker. I don't hear calling person and he don't hear me. On screen it looks like the phone is freezed. After 8 seconds everything is normal and i continue call.

Wierd is that it is always 8 seconds.

Does anyone have same issue?
